bootstrapServers.title: Bootstrap servers
bootstrapServers.description: Comma-separated list of host and port pairs for the the initial connection to the Kafka cluster (e.g. localhost:9092,another.host:9092).

topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Kafka topic to send audit events.

acks.title: Acks
acks.description: The number of acknowledgments the producer requires the leader to have received before considering a request complete.

schemaRegistryUrl.title: Schema Registry
schemaRegistryUrl.description: Host and port of schema registry (e.g. http://localhost:8081). Supported serializers: JSON.

username.title: Username

password.title: Password

auditTypes.title: Events to report
auditTypes.description: List of event types accepted by this reporter. If empty, reporter will accept all event types.

option.title: Property
option.description: Kafka producer configuration property (https://kafka.apache.org/documentation/#producerconfigs for more information).

value.title: Value
value.description: Kafka producer configuration property value (https://kafka.apache.org/documentation/#producerconfigs for more information).
